subject: Hockey, Ice
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Anaheim Ducks re-signed their captain, Ryan Getzlaf, to an eight-year, $66 million contract, tying him to his only N.H.L. team through the 2020-21 season.
snippet: The Anaheim Ducks re-signed their captain, Ryan Getzlaf, to an eight-year, $66 million contract, tying him to his only N.H.L. team through the 2020-21 season.
